info.network: uci show tdripcfg | grep tdripcfg | grep -v data
info.version: uci show tdripcfg | grep ':' | grep -v tdripcfg | grep -v 'usb list info' | grep -v 'Bus'
info.pr11version: size=`wc -c /tmp/pc02321/version-pr11 | awk  '{ print $1 }' 2>/dev/null`; version_len=`expr $size - 64`; version=`head -c $version_len /tmp/pc02321/version-pr11`; echo $version

server.get: uci show tdripcfg | grep tdripcfg | grep -v data

wan.get: uci show network | grep network.wan. | grep -v network.wan6

lan.get: uci show network | grep network.lan. | grep -v 'ip6\|force_line\|type\|force_link\|proto'
